scripts.dev:raw: concurrently -k -n infra,backend,frontend -c blue,yellow,green "npm run dev:infra" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:infra: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up postgres qdrant rabbitmq minio
scripts.dev:backend: wait-on tcp:5433 tcp:6333 tcp:5672 tcp:9000 && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up auth-api workflow-engine ingestion
scripts.dev:frontend: wait-on tcp:8004 tcp:8006 tcp:8001 && dotenv -e .env -- turbo run dev --filter=auth --filter=elevaite
scripts.dev:death: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml down -v --remove-orphans; docker rm -f $(docker ps -aq --filter 'name=elevaite') 2>/dev/null; echo 'ðŸ’€ Elevaite containers removed'
scripts.lint:python: uv run ruff check --extend-ignore=B904,E402,E501,E701,E721,E722,F401,F403,F811,F821,F823 python_apps/auth_api python_apps/workflow-engine-poc python_apps/ingestion-service python_packages/
scripts.lint:python:fix: uv run ruff check python_apps/auth_api python_apps/workflow-engine-poc python_apps/ingestion-service python_packages/ --fix
scripts.lint:python:all: uv run ruff check python_apps/ python_packages/
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint:python
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:python
scripts.format:python: uv run ruff format python_apps/auth_api python_apps/workflow-engine-poc python_apps/ingestion-service python_packages/
scripts.format:python:check: uv run ruff format --check python_apps/auth_api python_apps/workflow-engine-poc python_apps/ingestion-service python_packages/
scripts.format:python:all: uv run ruff format python_apps/ python_packages/
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run format:python
